name: Unlock PR
overview:
unlockPR is a full communications agency that attains big-agency results, while offering the personalized attention only offered in a boutique environment. unlockPR focuses on top tier modern parenting and lifestyle brands including Bugaboo, Oeuf, Appaman, Fleurville, Madewell and The Container Store. The unlockPR staff has diverse experience securing editorial, electronic, word of mom and Internet placements, as well as a strong connection with the celebrity community. We specialize in product launches, brand building, editorial and producing events. Our proven media and public relations campaigns have been endorsed by international corporations and individual clients in the modern parenting, beauty, fashion and lifestyle arenas.

unlockPR believes there is no second chance to make a good first impression. Executing the right PR strategy for your brand requires a dedicated focus to ensure results through simple, memorable communication.

acquisition.source_description: 72andSunny Acquires Unlock PR to Bolster Earned Media Capabilities
